sentences.en: A few statistics will illustrate the general trend.
sentences.cn: 少数统计资料就能说明这种总趋势.

sentences.en: A set of synthetic data is used to illustrate these methods.
sentences.cn: 一组模拟数据被用来说明这些方法.

sentences.en: He quoted some old Chinese sayings to illustrate his points.
sentences.cn: 他援用了一些中国话来解释他的论点.

sentences.en: Here are few examples to illustrate this principle.
sentences.cn: 略举数例,用以说明这一原理.

sentences.en: I can cite quite a few instances to illustrate.
sentences.cn: 我可以举出好几件事来说明.

sentences.en: Let me give an example to illustrate the point.
sentences.cn: 让我举个例子来说明这一点。

sentences.en: Over a hundred diagrams, tables and pictures illustrate the book.
sentences.cn: 这本书有一百多幅图解、表格和图片。

sentences.en: She illustrated her discussion with diagrams.
sentences.cn: 她用图表来说明她的论述。

sentences.en: The above circuIt'serves to illustrate the principle of the gage.
sentences.cn: 上述线路图是用来说明应变计的作用原理的.

sentences.en: The company's bank statements illustrate its success.
sentences.cn: 这家公司的银行报表说明了它的成功.

sentences.en: The following brief descriptions illustrate significant examples of their work.
sentences.cn: 以下扼要介绍一下他们工作中的一些重要实例.

sentences.en: The following tale will clearly illustrate this point.
sentences.cn: 接下来的故事将清楚地阐明这一点。

sentences.en: This diagram will illustrate what I mean.
sentences.cn: 这个图表可说明我的意思.

sentences.en: Those are expressly designed to illustrate the vagaries of Leibnizian notation.
sentences.cn: 那些是用来说明莱布尼兹记号的巧妙想法.

sentences.en: To illustrate my point I have done a comparative analysis.
sentences.cn: 为说明我的观点,我做了对比分析.

sentences.en: To illustrate the foregoing analysis, consider a linear elestic solid.
sentences.cn: 为了举例阐明以上的分析, 我们考虑一种线性的弹性固体.

sentences.en: Two cases involving SEC " no - action letters " illustrate these difficulties.
sentences.cn: 两个涉及证券交易委员会的 " 不行动书 " 的案例说明了这些困难.

sentences.en: With some simple properties, particles can usefully illustrate many laws of physics.
sentences.cn: 粒子具有简单的性质, 可用来阐明物理学的许多定律.

words.tran_cn: 说明的；作例证的；解说的
插图画家；说明者；图解者

trans.tran_en: to make the meaning of something clearer by giving examples

trans.tran_cn: 说明， 阐明； 给…作插图说明
trans.tran_en: to make the meaning of something clearer by giving examples
